00026 #include "utfconv.h"
00027 
00028 size_t count_utf_8_from_16(const wchar_t *string16)
00029 {
00030     int i;
00031     size_t count = 0;
00032     wchar_t u = 0;
00033     if (!string16) {
00034         return 0;
00035     }
00036 
00037     for (i = 0; (u = string16[i]); i++) {
00038         if (u < 0x0080) {
00039             count += 1;
00040         }
00041         else {
00042             if (u < 0x0800) {
00043                 count += 2;
00044             }
00045             else {
00046                 if (u < 0xD800) {
00047                     count += 3;
00048                 }
00049                 else {
00050                     if (u < 0xDC00) {
00051                         i++;
00052                         if ((u = string16[i]) == 0) {
00053                             break;
00054                         }
00055                         if (u >= 0xDC00 && u < 0xE000) {
00056                             count += 4;
00057                         }
00058                     }
00059                     else {
00060                         if (u < 0xE000) {
00061                             /*illigal*/;
00062                         }
00063                         else {
00064                             count += 3;
00065                         }
00066                     }
00067                 }
00068             }
00069         }
00070     }
00071 
00072     return ++count;
00073 }
00074 
00075 
00076 size_t count_utf_16_from_8(const char *string8)
00077 {
00078     size_t count = 0;
00079     char u;
00080     char type = 0;
00081     unsigned int u32 = 0;
00082 
00083     if (!string8) return 0;
00084 
00085     for (; (u = *string8); string8++) {
00086         if (type == 0) {
00087             if ((u & 0x01 << 7) == 0)     { count++; u32 = 0; continue; }       //1 utf-8 char
00088             if ((u & 0x07 << 5) == 0xC0)  { type = 1; u32 = u & 0x1F; continue; } //2 utf-8 char
00089             if ((u & 0x0F << 4) == 0xE0)  { type = 2; u32 = u & 0x0F; continue; } //3 utf-8 char
00090             if ((u & 0x1F << 3) == 0xF0)  { type = 3; u32 = u & 0x07; continue; } //4 utf-8 char
00091             continue;
00092         }
00093         else {
00094             if ((u & 0xC0) == 0x80) {
00095                 u32 = (u32 << 6) | (u & 0x3F);
00096                 type--;
00097             }
00098             else {
00099                 u32 = 0;
00100                 type = 0;
00101             }
00102         }
00103 
00104         if (type == 0) {
00105             if ((0 < u32 && u32 < 0xD800) || (0xE000 <= u32 && u32 < 0x10000)) count++;
00106             else if (0x10000 <= u32 && u32 < 0x110000) count += 2;
00107             u32 = 0;
00108         }
00109     }
00110 
00111     return ++count;
00112 }

00115 int conv_utf_16_to_8(const wchar_t *in16, char *out8, size_t size8)
00116 {
00117     char *out8end = out8 + size8;
00118     wchar_t u = 0;
00119     int err = 0;
00120     if (!size8 || !in16 || !out8) return UTF_ERROR_NULL_IN;
00121     out8end--;
00122 
00123     for (; out8 < out8end && (u = *in16); in16++, out8++) {
00124         if (u < 0x0080) {
00125             *out8 = u;
00126         }
00127         else if (u < 0x0800) {
00128             if (out8 + 1 >= out8end) break;
00129             *out8++ = (0x3 << 6) | (0x1F & (u >> 6));
00130             *out8  = (0x1 << 7) | (0x3F & (u));
00131         }
00132         else if (u < 0xD800 || u >= 0xE000) {
00133             if (out8 + 2 >= out8end) break;
00134             *out8++ = (0x7 << 5) | (0xF & (u >> 12));
00135             *out8++ = (0x1 << 7) | (0x3F & (u >> 6));;
00136             *out8  = (0x1 << 7) | (0x3F & (u));
00137         }
00138         else if (u < 0xDC00) {
00139             wchar_t u2 = *++in16;
00140 
00141             if (!u2) break;
00142             if (u2 >= 0xDC00 && u2 < 0xE000) {
00143                 if (out8 + 3 >= out8end) break; else {
00144                     unsigned int uc = 0x10000 + (u2 - 0xDC00) + ((u - 0xD800) << 10);
00145 
00146                     *out8++ = (0xF << 4) | (0x7 & (uc >> 18));
00147                     *out8++ = (0x1 << 7) | (0x3F & (uc >> 12));
00148                     *out8++ = (0x1 << 7) | (0x3F & (uc >> 6));
00149                     *out8  = (0x1 << 7) | (0x3F & (uc));
00150                 }
00151             }
00152             else {
00153                 out8--; err |= UTF_ERROR_ILLCHAR;
00154             }
00155         }
00156         else if (u < 0xE000) {
00157             out8--; err |= UTF_ERROR_ILLCHAR;
00158         }
00159     }
00160 
00161     *out8 = *out8end = 0;
00162 
00163     if (*in16) err |= UTF_ERROR_SMALL;
00164 
00165     return err;
00166 }
00167 
00168 
00169 int conv_utf_8_to_16(const char *in8, wchar_t *out16, size_t size16)
00170 {
00171     char u;
00172     char type = 0;
00173     wchar_t u32 = 0;
00174     wchar_t *out16end = out16 + size16;
00175     int err = 0;
00176     if (!size16 || !in8 || !out16) return UTF_ERROR_NULL_IN;
00177     out16end--;
00178 
00179     for (; out16 < out16end && (u = *in8); in8++) {
00180         if (type == 0) {
00181             if ((u & 0x01 << 7) == 0)     { *out16 = u; out16++; u32 = 0; continue; } //1 utf-8 char
00182             if ((u & 0x07 << 5) == 0xC0)  { type = 1; u32 = u & 0x1F; continue; }     //2 utf-8 char
00183             if ((u & 0x0F << 4) == 0xE0)  { type = 2; u32 = u & 0x0F; continue; }     //3 utf-8 char
00184             if ((u & 0x1F << 3) == 0xF0)  { type = 3; u32 = u & 0x07; continue; }     //4 utf-8 char
00185             err |= UTF_ERROR_ILLCHAR;
00186             continue;
00187         }
00188         else {
00189             if ((u & 0xC0) == 0x80) {
00190                 u32 = (u32 << 6) | (u & 0x3F);
00191                 type--;
00192             }
00193             else {
00194                 u32 = 0; type = 0; err |= UTF_ERROR_ILLSEQ;
00195             }
00196         }
00197         if (type == 0) {
00198             if ((0 < u32 && u32 < 0xD800) || (0xE000 <= u32 && u32 < 0x10000)) {
00199                 *out16 = u32;
00200                 out16++;
00201             }
00202             else if (0x10000 <= u32 && u32 < 0x110000) {
00203                 if (out16 + 1 >= out16end) break;
00204                 u32 -= 0x10000;
00205                 *out16 = 0xD800 + (u32 >> 10);
00206                 out16++;
00207                 *out16 = 0xDC00 + (u32 & 0x3FF);
00208                 out16++;
00209             }
00210             u32 = 0;
00211         }
00212 
00213     }
00214 
00215     *out16 = *out16end = 0;
00216 
00217     if (*in8) err |= UTF_ERROR_SMALL;
00218 
00219     return err;
00220 }
00221 
00222 int is_ascii(const char *in8)
00223 {
00224     for (; *in8; in8++)
00225         if (0x80 & *in8) return 0;
00226 
00227     return 1;
00228 }

00230 void utf_8_cut_end(char *inout8, size_t maxcutpoint)
00231 {
00232     char *cur = inout8 + maxcutpoint;
00233     char cc;
00234     if (!inout8) return;
00235 
00236     cc = *cur;
00237 }

00240 
00241 char *alloc_utf_8_from_16(const wchar_t *in16, size_t add)
00242 {
00243     size_t bsize = count_utf_8_from_16(in16);
00244     char *out8 = NULL;
00245     if (!bsize) return NULL;
00246     out8 = (char *)malloc(sizeof(char) * (bsize + add));
00247     conv_utf_16_to_8(in16, out8, bsize);
00248     return out8;
00249 }
00250 
00251 wchar_t *alloc_utf16_from_8(const char *in8, size_t add)
00252 {
00253     size_t bsize = count_utf_16_from_8(in8);
00254     wchar_t *out16 = NULL;
00255     if (!bsize) return NULL;
00256     out16 = (wchar_t *) malloc(sizeof(wchar_t) * (bsize + add));
00257     conv_utf_8_to_16(in8, out16, bsize);
00258     return out16;
00259 }
